data.text: @Amyibeeson @hummingbbakery Cake outttt!!! What's more fun than the bday girl having the cake all to herself!! Happy birthday to your baby Lyra ❤
@Amyibeeson @hummingbbakery I recommend also freezing some if you want. Wrap tightly in a good amount of cling film and store in a plastic box. Did it with my birthday cake and it was fine! ☺️
@Amyibeeson @hummingbbakery Happy birthday to your little one!🎉🎉🎉🥳🥳
@Amyibeeson Our cakes are best consumed within the first 48 hours after receiving them x https://t.co/Dovu0kRNnb
@hummingbbakery Thank you. How long do they last for?
@Amyibeeson Hi Amy. So sorry to hear about the cancelled party! We recommend to keep our cakes in cool room temperature x https://t.co/Dovu0kRNnb
